details.spack_dependencies: ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^imagemagick@7.0.8-7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' imagemagick@7.0.8-7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^ffmpeg@4.3.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' ffmpeg@4.3.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
details.spack_spec: py-matplotlib@3.4.3 % gcc@10.2.0 +animation +fonts +image ~latex +movies ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^imagemagick@7.0.8-7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' imagemagick@7.0.8-7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^ffmpeg@4.3.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' ffmpeg@4.3.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
